name: Oath Protocol
description: Oath Protocol describes itself as a crowd-sourced decision-making platform that combines blockchain technology, game theory, categorized random algorithms, and relational attributes. Reported to have 15.000+ registered users, Oath Jurorsâ€œ facilitate conflict resolution in a decentralized network. In addition, Oath Protocol can be used to provide customer or market insights for organizations in order to provide reliable data in a fast and cost-efficient manner while Oath Jurors get rewarded in OATH tokens for providing their opinion on a certain case.
